channel.title: Add another option for moparscape v3.0!
channel.description:
well sence the new moparscape 3.0 is here i have noticed 1 thing, language filters wdf!
i suggest u make it where we can check if we want the filter, or we can uncheck it if we dont want the filter
cause this is really gay[br][size=1]Posted at: July 18, 2006, 10:32:09 AM[/size][hr]hmm and another question, is the filter blocking everything comming into your client thats on the filter list? or is it blocking everything comming out from your client from the filter list. in other words, if some 1 still is using moparscape 2.1 and desides to swear, will it block it? or will u still be able to hear what hes saying

item.title: Add another option for moparscape v3.0!
item.dc:creator: @cheatcode111 cheatcode111
item.description:
@cheatcode111 wrote:

Ya and fix the damn “?” Everytime we say 1 letter and thats it the client freezes -.-, when the bugs are out, THEN ill use mopar3.0, as much as i like those extra features

Read full topic

humm… “askes lord if he can have some”
also when i kill something it shows that item as dwarf skelital aka “null”
but other then that its good

item.title: Add another option for moparscape v3.0!
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“KsMuffin, post:3, topic:5292”]I just plain out say Screw mopar 3,its got all this extra stuff you dont even use.

And all that extra crude lags you.

Thats why i stick with mopar2,somtimes i even use Endar v4[/quote]

or your just not bright enough to use the extra stuff so its only crud to you

Read full topic
